accountManager.errorInstallEnable: Something went wrong. Please try again.

alertAccountNotInstalled.title: PrestaShop Account module needed
alertAccountNotInstalled.message: To enable this module you need to install the PrestaShop Account module on your shop

alertAccountNotEnabled.title: PrestaShop Account module needed
alertAccountNotEnabled.message: To enable this module you need to activate the PrestaShop Account module on your shop

multiShopSelector.title: Multi-store mode activated
multiShopSelector.subtitle: You must configure your stores one by one for this service but you will be able to use the same account.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Please select the first store to configure from the list below
multiShopSelector.tips: After you are done with the first shop, you can configure the others by selecting them one by one in the shop selector, in the horizontal menu

account.title: Your PrestaShop account
account.authorize: Authorize your account to manage your shop's services
account.authorized: You authorize this account to manage shop's services
account.emailConfirmationAlert: A confirmation email has been sent. Check your inbox and click on the link to activate your account
account.needToBeAdmin: In order to proceed you need to be administrator of the shop
account.unlinkShopModalTitle: Are you sure you want to unlink your store from your account ?
account.unlinkShopModalContent: By clicking on Yes, I confirm, you authorize your PrestaShop account to be unlink from the store.
account.unlinkShopAlert: Your store has been successfully unlinked
account.unlinkShopError: Error while trying to unlink shop
